note.note-paragraph: This subclass covers:individual organic electric solid-state devices, i.e. electric solid-state devices comprising organic material in the active part;integrated devices, or assemblies of multiple devices, comprising such elements.

This subclass does not cover:organic electronic memory devices, which are covered by subclass H10B;organic thermoelectric devices, organic thermomagnetic devices, organic piezoelectric devices, organic electrostrictive devices, organic magnetostrictive devices, organic galvanomagnetic devices, organic Hall-effect devices, organic superconducting devices or organic solid-state devices having no potential barriers, and specially adapted for rectifying, amplifying, oscillating or switching, which are covered by subclass H10N;organic resistors having no potential barriers and not specially adapted for integrated devices, which are covered by subclass H01C;organic capacitors having no potential barriers and not specially adapted for integrated devices, which are covered by subclass H01G.
In this subclass, the periodic system used is the I to VIII group system indicated in the Periodic Table under Note (3) of section C.
In this subclass, it is desirable to add the indexing codes of groups H10K2101/00 - H10K2102/00.

title-part.text: Organic devices specially adapted for rectifying, amplifying, oscillating or switching
Organic devices specially adapted for rectifying, amplifying, oscillating or switching
Organic capacitors or resistors having potential barriers

reference.text: integrated devices or assemblies of multiple devices H10K19/00

Lateral bottom-gate IGFETs comprising only a single gate
the gate dielectric comprising only organic materials
the gate dielectric comprising only inorganic materials
the gate dielectric comprising a multilayered structure
comprising at least one organic layer and at least one inorganic layer
the gate dielectric comprising a layer of composite material comprising interpenetrating or embedded materials, e.g. TiO2 particles in a polymer matrix
the IGFET comprising multiple separately-addressable gate electrodes
the channel region comprising two or more active layers, e.g. forming pn heterojunctions
the channel region comprising a layer of composite material having interpenetrating or embedded materials, e.g. a mixture of donor and acceptor moieties, that form a bulk heterojunction
Vertical transistors, e.g. vertical carbon nanotube field effect transistors [CNT-FETs]
